languages.text: На белесом камне хорошо заметны следи грязи — чернозема с крупными цветными вкраплениями. Вы подбираете щепотку странной почвы и заворачиваете ее в платок.

traits.locale_text: На белесом камне хорошо заметны следи грязи — чернозема с крупными цветными вкраплениями. Вы подбираете щепотку странной почвы и заворачиваете ее в платок.

languages.text: Traces of dirt are clearly visible on the whiteish stone — black soil with large coloured flecks. You take a pinch of the strange soil and wrap it in a cloth.
languages.original_text: На белесом камне хорошо заметны следи грязи — чернозема с крупными цветными вкраплениями. Вы подбираете щепотку странной почвы и заворачиваете ее в платок.

traits.locale_text: Traces of dirt are clearly visible on the whiteish stone — black soil with large colored flecks. You take a pinch of the strange soil and wrap it in a cloth.
Traces of dirt are clearly visible on the whiteish stone — black soil with large colored flecks. You take a pinch of the strange soil and wrap it in a cloth.
Traces of dirt are clearly visible on the whiteish stone — black soil with large colored flecks. You take a pinch of the strange soil and wrap it in a cloth.
Traces of dirt are clearly visible on the whiteish stone — black soil with large coloured flecks. You take a pinch of the strange soil and wrap it in a cloth.

languages.text: 汚れの跡が白っぽい石にくっきりと残っている。色とりどりの大きな斑がある黒い土だ。あなたは奇妙な土をひとつまみとって、布に包む。
languages.original_text: Traces of dirt are clearly visible on the whiteish stone — black soil with large coloured flecks. You take a pinch of the strange soil and wrap it in a cloth.

traits.locale_text: 汚れの跡が白っぽい石にくっきりと残っている。色とりどりの大きな斑がある黒い土だ。あなたは奇妙な土をひとつまみとって、布に包む。

languages.text: 白色的石头上可以清楚地看到泥土的痕迹，这种黑色泥土混杂着大块大块的彩色斑点。你取了一撮这种奇怪的泥土，用布包了起来。
languages.original_text: Traces of dirt are clearly visible on the whiteish stone — black soil with large coloured flecks. You take a pinch of the strange soil and wrap it in a cloth.

traits.locale_text: 白色的石头上可以清楚地看到泥土的痕迹，这种黑色泥土混杂着大块大块的彩色斑点。你取了一撮这种奇怪的泥土，用布包了起来。

languages.text: Sobre la piedra blancuzca puedes ver restos de tierra oscura con grandes motas de color. Coges un poco y la envuelves en una tela.
languages.original_text: Traces of dirt are clearly visible on the whiteish stone — black soil with large coloured flecks. You take a pinch of the strange soil and wrap it in a cloth.

traits.locale_text: Sobre la piedra blancuzca puedes ver restos de tierra oscura con grandes motas de color. Coges un poco y la envuelves en una tela.

languages.text: Spuren von Schmutz sind auf dem weißlichen Stein deutlich erkennbar – schwarze Erde mit großen, farbigen Flecken. Du nimmst eine Probe von der seltsamen Substanz und schlägst sie in ein Tuch ein.
languages.original_text: Traces of dirt are clearly visible on the whiteish stone — black soil with large coloured flecks. You take a pinch of the strange soil and wrap it in a cloth.

traits.locale_text: Spuren von Schmutz sind auf dem weißlichen Stein deutlich erkennbar – schwarze Erde mit großen, farbigen Flecken. Du nimmst eine Probe von der seltsamen Substanz und schlägst sie in ein Tuch ein.

languages.text: Des traces sombres sont clairement visibles sur la pierre blanchâtre : il s'agit de terre noire mouchetée de grosses taches colorées. Vous en prenez une pincée et la mettez dans un morceau de tissu.
languages.original_text: Traces of dirt are clearly visible on the whiteish stone — black soil with large coloured flecks. You take a pinch of the strange soil and wrap it in a cloth.

traits.locale_text: Des traces sombres sont clairement visibles sur la pierre blanchâtre : il s'agit de terre noire mouchetée de grosses taches colorées. Vous en prenez une pincée et la mettez dans un morceau de tissu.

languages.text: Beyazımsı taşın üstündeki toprak parçalarının izleri, net bir şekilde belli oluyor. Büyük renkli noktalara sahip, siyah bir toprak görüyor ve tuhaf topraktan küçük bir miktar alıp beze sarıyorsun.
languages.original_text: Traces of dirt are clearly visible on the whiteish stone — black soil with large coloured flecks. You take a pinch of the strange soil and wrap it in a cloth.

traits.locale_text: Beyazımsı taşın üstündeki toprak parçalarının izleri, net bir şekilde belli oluyor. Büyük renkli noktalara sahip, siyah bir toprak görüyor ve tuhaf topraktan küçük bir miktar alıp beze sarıyorsun.
